attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ashley Cole should undoubtedly be deported from our great nation on the grounds that he simultaneously offended men and women with his outrageous behaviour and insufferably unfashionable underpants. His treatment of a fellow Britton (Cheryl Cole) has battered the principals of marriage and cast widespread distrust between all spouses with a mobile telephone.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
